Titles.eng: LAST EXILE - Fam, the Silver Wing
Titles.jpn: ラストエグザイル-銀翼のファム-

Summaries.eng: Years ago, humanity abandoned the ruined Blue World. Generations later, with the planet again capable of sustaining life, mankind returned. In the skies above the reborn world, rebellious young Fam and her best friend Giselle make their living as Sky Pirates. Atop sleek Vespa Vanships, the girls dart fearlessly through the clouds, capturing and selling airborne battleships for profit. It’s a life of care-free swashbuckling – until the Ades Federation attacks. The only nation to remain on Blue World during humanity’s exile, The Ades Federation wages war against those who returned only after the planet’s darkest days had passed. When Fam and Giselle rescue a princess from the clutches of the rampaging Ades armada, they join the young royal’s battle to save her Kingdom from destruction – and undertake the impossible mission of uniting humanity in peace.
Summaries.jpn: Years ago, humanity abandoned the ruined Blue World. Generations later, with the planet again capable of sustaining life, mankind returned. In the skies above the reborn world, rebellious young Fam and her best friend Giselle make their living as Sky Pirates. Atop sleek Vespa Vanships, the girls dart fearlessly through the clouds, capturing and selling airborne battleships for profit. It’s a life of care-free swashbuckling – until the Ades Federation attacks. The only nation to remain on Blue World during humanity’s exile, The Ades Federation wages war against those who returned only after the planet’s darkest days had passed. When Fam and Giselle rescue a princess from the clutches of the rampaging Ades armada, they join the young royal’s battle to save her Kingdom from destruction – and undertake the impossible mission of uniting humanity in peace.

Aliases: Last Exile: Fam, The Silver Wing

Summaries.eng: Flashback: Giselle and Millia relive their recent adventures while writing letters to Giselle’s family.

Titles.jpn: Fam, The Silver Wing Movie - Over the Wishes

Summaries.eng: Young sky pirates Fam and Giselle boldly attempt to rescue Turan Princesses Lilliana and Millia from a trap set by Luscinia of the Ades Federation.
Summaries.jpn: In the skies above the sacred Grand Lake, the Ades Federation declares war on the kingdom of Turan. Just when the Turan flagship's destruction seems inevitable, a Sky Pirate named Fam boldly states, "I've made up my mind! I'm going to steal that ship!"

Summaries.eng: Luscinia reveals his violent intentions for the descendants of those who abandoned the planet. Meanwhile, as Fam, Giselle, and Millia attempt to rescue Lilliana, the capital of Turan is dealt a destructive and tragic blow.
Summaries.jpn: Princess Liliana is sent to Iglasia with instructions for defending the royal city from the Federation assault. Meanwhile, Princess Millia readies a surprise attack of her own, but little does she know Luscinia has a trick up his sleeve too...

Summaries.eng: Luscinia reports to the Augusta after leading his forces in battle against the Notos. Later, Fam shares her past with Millia, revealing how she came to live as a Sky Pirate.
Summaries.jpn: With her kingdom now under Federation control, Princess Millia finally begins to understand what it means to be a Sky Pirate. Fam also reveals details about her past and her dream for the future.

Summaries.eng: Fam leads a crew on a mission to commandeer a ghost ship known as Silvius the Reaper. The vessel’s captain captures Fam, Giselle, and Millia - and refuses to release them unless they capture fifteen Federation ships.
Even though Millia is uneasy with the decision to meet Tatiana’s demands, Fam and Giselle disguise themselves as Federation troops and move forward with their risky plan.
Summaries.jpn: Millia is dumbfounded to find that Fam made an agreement with Silvius'captain, Tatiana, to seize 15 of Ades Federation's fleets, in exchange for their freedom.

Summaries.eng: Word begins to spread that Tatiana has joined Millia’s mission to re-establish the Turan government, even as Sara deploys her forces to recapture more land from the returnees.
Summaries.jpn: In the hope of capturing their next battleship, Fam and company visit Eldorado, an amusement center where underground Vanship races are held.

Summaries.eng: Fam and Giselle find themselves competing with rival Sky Pirates for Federation prey - until both bands of pirates are caught off guard by an ambushing Ades fleet!
Summaries.jpn: With only one ship left until their agreement with Tatiana is fulfilled, Fam and company aim to capture a fleet of eight ships being transported from the north.

Summaries.eng: As a battle rages, Giselle struggles to deal with Fam’s recklessness. Even worse, when she sees Millia and Fam pull of a difficult maneuver that she’s been unable to execute, she begins questioning her skills.

With her birthday approaching, Fam is distressed to learn that Giselle is considering giving up her position as navigator - and even more distressed when she realizes she might be taking her friend for granted.
Summaries.jpn: The final target was the Anshar, the flagship of the Ades Federation's 1st Fleet. Now that their agreement with Tatiana has been fulfilled, Giselle prepares to leave the Silvius... but without Fam.

Summaries.eng: When a Federation fleet interrupts a celebration of the new Anatoray-Disith/Turan alliance, Millia is surprised to discover Lilliana aboard one of the ships - and shocked when her sister places Turan under Ades rule.
Summaries.jpn: Much to Fam and friends' elation, Turan and Anatoray form an alliance with Millia and Vincent acting as delegates. Suddenly the Impetus, an Ades Federation flagship, appears... along with Luscinia and Liliana.

Summaries.eng: Ten years ago, the Grand Race was an opportunity for the citizens of the world to honor harmony and unity. Unfortunately, even the most peaceful day of celebration can be marred by tragedy and violence.

Fam, Millia, and Giselle crash in Glacies, where Dyan helps them repair their ship. After leaving their new friend’s land, the girls are forced to turn back after the appearance of an approaching Ades threat. Can they warn Dyan in time?

Fam and the others rush to warn Dyan of the decoy Ades fleet - only to find that the battered Glacien forces have already fallen for the trap. With the Federation closing in on their base, Glacies must resort to extreme measures.
After Millia reveals that she intends to kill Lilliana, Fam tries to convince her to find another way to deal with the situation. Later, Vasant makes an offer that might lead to Luscinia's defeat.

Vasant asks Millia to join the Joint Forces and lead the Turans in the fight against Luscinia. Unfortunately, matters are complicated by the fact that Glacien troops are already involved - and Dyan refuses to cooperate with Millia.
Summaries.jpn: Millia and friends have an audience with Augusta Sara in the capital city of Morvarid.

Summaries.eng: The battle for Boreas begins. As the Joint Forces take on Luscinia's troops, Orang unleashes a surprising tactic, and Sara struggles to deal with the conflict’s ramifications.
Summaries.jpn: The Ades Federation's 3rd and 4th Fleets advance on the key strategic land of Boreas. A decisive, multi-fleet battle over Augusta Sara ensues. Millia takes command of her fleet, while Fam and the Sky Pirates take to the air in armed Vespas.

Summaries.eng: Tensions are boiling over among the Joint Forces troops entrenched at Boreas, and misunderstandings and miscommunication lead to a friendly fire incident. Later, Sara devises a plan that could lead to a truce.

Just as it seems hostilities might end, Millia is caught in a trap set by Luscinia. Later, after Lilliana tries to convince her sister that Luscinia holds the key to peace, a tragedy leaves Millia in control of the Turan Exile.
With Lilliana gone, Casualties mount as the truce quickly crumbles. While the fractured Federation forces do battle, Luscinia takes a captured Sara to the Grand Exile.

As Luscinia attempts to disarm the military, Tatiana leads an assault on Sadri's fleet. Millia asks Dyan to join Fam, Giselle, and Alvis on a dangerous mission to rescue Sara from the heart of the Grand Exile.
Summaries.jpn: After abducting Augusta Sara, Luscinia activates the Grand Exile.

Summaries.eng: The line between hero and villain begins to blur, and the nations of the world find peace within their reach - but first, sacrifices must be made.
